oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nonlinear $\arctan$-electrodynamics and charged black holes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kruglov, S. I.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Physics - General Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We investigate a model of nonlinear electrodynamics with the Lagrangian density ${\cal L} = -(1/\beta)\arctan(\beta F_{\mu\nu}F^{\mu\nu}/4)$. The phenomenon of vacuum birefringence is studied. The model of electromagnetic fields coupled with the gravitation field is considered. The black hole solution is obtained possessing the asymptotic Reissner-Nordstr\"om solution. The corrections to Reissner-Nordstr\"om solution are found.
Comment: 13 pages, 1 figure, corrected typos, accepted for publication
